1078770.name: New Day: Cataclysm
1078770.description: New Day: Cataclysm is a free to play single player base defense game. Your goal is to keep surviving day after day against a growing horde of hostile monsters. During the day you gather resources and reinforce your base and during the night you fight off the attacking monsters. Upgrade your walls, add barricades, place mines, unlock new weapons and more! This game was a 2 month learning project, made by a small group of students.
1078770.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
